name: issue
description: Command line tool for displaying issues using the issuemd library
author: Billy Moon <billy@issue.md>

scripts.start: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test:cover
scripts.format: bash -c "js-beautify -f bin/issue -f src/*.js test/*.js plugins/*/*.js plugins/*/*/*.js -r"
scripts.test:cover: bash -c "istanbul cover --print none --report none --dir reports/coverage -- node_modules/minijasminenode/bin/minijn --noStack --verbose plugins/*/*/*.unit.js test/*.unit.js" && istanbul report --root reports/coverage text
